website_summaries.verdict: A high-powered, lightweight tool that planes up to 3-1/4 inches wide and 3/32 inches deep in a single pass.
pros: A solidly built, reliable machine that is appropriate for professional woodworkers who do construction framing as well as window and door installations
It cuts smooth, has a lock-on button for ease of use, and weighs less than 6 pounds
cons: A planer can make a mess so you'll likely want to purchase a broom or the optional dust bag

customer_reviews.title: Why have I waited so long to buy this?
customer_reviews.text: I've done woodworking for 50 years and am pretty good with hand tools, but this is an amazing timesaver, and can be used with a lot of finesse. I got this to clean up some large beams (6" X 12") that were too heavy and unwieldy to put through my stationary planer, and the results were exceptional. This planer also slices through end grain like butter and leaves a smooth result with no tear-out. Once you get used to it, you can use it on other than straight or flat surfaces: I used it to cleanup some shallow curves that I had bandsawed on the beams.

customer_reviews.text: I have bought Makita tools in the past and have always been pleased with them. One of the primary purposes I use this for is beveling door edges and I would think that it would come included with the tool as it did when I bought a metabo planer 30 years ago. product_meta.title: Makita KP0800K 3-1/4-Inch Planer Kit, Blue
product_meta.description:
The Makita KP0800K 3-1/4-Inch Planer delivers power, cutting capacity and ease of use. It is ideal for professional construction framing, window and door installation, and fine woodworking.

AMAZON.COM
The Makita KP0800K 3-1/4-Inch Planer delivers power, cutting capacity and ease of use. It is ideal for professional construction framing, window and door installation, and fine woodworking.



6.5 AMP Power
The KP0800K features a 6.5 AMP motor that delivers more output power, with a two-blade cutter head and 17,000 RPM for increased stock removal and superior finishes. The KP0800K is equipped with double edge carbide blades for added performance, and can plane up to 3-1/4 inches wide and 3/32 inches deep in a single pass. The rigid die-cast aluminum housing with all ball bearing construction is engineered for long tool life, and the precision-machined aluminum base delivers more planning accuracy.Ease-of-Use Features
The KP0800K weighs only 5.7 pounds for a high power-to-weight ratio, with an ergonomically-centered balance and rubberized front and rear handles for more comfortable operation. The machined aluminum and balanced planer drum is engineered for reduced vibration and added durability, and the spring-loaded stand elevates the base to protect the workpiece. Additional ease-of-use features include a lock-on button for continuous operation, and an easy blade setting system for fast blade installation.

Engineered for Framing and Woodworking
The KP0800K is engineered for professional construction framing, window and door installation, and fine woodworking. The KP0800K is just another example of Makita's commitment to innovative technology and best-in-class engineering.

About Makita's Power Tools
Makita delivers precision, accuracy, capacity, and innovation to woodworkers. Makita has full range of miter saws, jig saws, circular saws, routers, planers, sanders, nailers and staplers, blades, compact cordless drills and impacts, and more. Makita's woodworking solutions are engineered for pro contractors, for use in high production settings and in home shops.

About Makita
Makita is a worldwide manufacturer of industrial quality power tools and offers a wide range of industrial accessories. Makita applies leading-edge innovation to engineer power tools that are more compact and energy efficient, yet deliver industrial strength power and results. Makita U.S.A., Inc. is located in La Mirada, California, and operates an extensive distribution network located throughout the U.S. For more information, please call 800/4-MAKITA (800/462-5482) or visit makitatools.com. Makita is Best in Class Engineering.

Warranty
Every Makita tool is thoroughly inspected and tested before leaving the factory. If you are not satisfied with any Makita tool within 30 days of purchase, return it and Makita will provide a replacement or refund. Each Makita tool is warranted to be free of defects from workmanship and materials for the period of ONE YEAR from the date of original purchase. Should any trouble develop during this one-year period, return the COMPLETE tool, freight prepaid, to one of Makita's Factory or Authorized Service Centers. Please see makitatools.com for complete details.

Whats in the Box
Makita KP0800K 3-1/4-Inch Planer Kit, blade gauge assembly, wrench, guide rule, blade set and tool case.






FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Makita's new planer has a high power to weight ratio with easy blade setting system for fast blade installation. Equipped with Double edge carbide blades for added performance. It has a rigid die cast aluminum housing with all ball bearingconstruction for long tool life. It has machined aluminum and balanced planer drum for reduced vibration and added durability.
